findings.title: A floating pragma is set SWC-103
findings.description: The current pragma Solidity directive is "^0.6.12". It is recommended to specify a fixed compiler version to ensure that the bytecode produced does not vary between builds.

findings.title: Potential use of block.number as source of randomness (SWC-120)
findings.description: The environment variable 'block.number' looks like it might be used as a source of randomness. Note that the values of variables like coinbase, gaslimit, block number and timestamp are predictable and can be manipulated by a malicious miner.

findings.title: Unused function parameter from, to, amount
findings.description: The value of the function parameters 'from', 'to', 'amount' does not seem to be used anywhere in '_beforeTokenTransfer'

findings.title: Function could be marked as external
findings.description: The function definition of the following is marked 'public'. However, it is never directly called by another function in the same contract or in any of its descendants. Consider to mark it as 'external' instead.
